attributes.action: Revise rules on MPs conduct regarding expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It can no longer be acceptable for MPs to claim legality while blatantly acting morally corrupt over expense claims. Nobody cares about political affiliation, if it’s wrong its wrong and this stinks. The second J. Smith debacle has to be the straw that breaks the British publics back. All party MPs seem to be closing ranks, so it’s up to the public to bring an end to this legal embezzlement.
